geminitranslator-desc: AI-powered translation of page content using Gemini
geminitranslator-ui-translated: The content below was automatically translated by Gemini.
geminitranslator-ui-error: An error occurred while translating this section.
geminitranslator-error-no-api-key: Gemini API key is missing or not configured.
geminitranslator-error-bad-response: Received an invalid response from the Gemini API.
